General.Name: FG Financial Group
General.Description: Fundamental Global Inc. engages in reinsurance, merchant banking, and asset management business. The company offers initial public offering services. It also offers specialty property and casualty reinsurance services. In addition, the company provides investment advisory services. Fundamental Global Inc. was founded in 1932 and is based in Mooresville, North Carolina.
General.Address: 108 Gateway Boulevard, Mooresville, NC, United States, 28117
